com.delphix.masking.api.provider

Interface MaskValueMetadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MaskValueMetadataImpl

    public interface MaskValueMetadata
    This interface provides metadata describing each value being masked.
    Since:
    1.4.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long UNKNOWN_LENGTH_SENTINEL 
      static long UNLIMITED_LENGTH_SENTINEL

      boolean isStringMaxLengthEncoded()
      Get a boolean value indicating whether the value returned by getStringMaxLength() method represents the maximum Java String length in characters (false), or a byte length limit that should be applied to the encoded String (true).

    • Method Detail

      • getStorageType

        UnderlyingDataType getStorageType()

        Get the UnderlyingDataType value indicating the storage type of the value masked. This information more precisely reflects storage type of the value than MaskingType. The result will be null when this information is not available.

        The special values UNKNOWN_LENGTH_SENTINEL and UNLIMITED_LENGTH_SENTINEL represent special case values for maximum length. Presence of these sentinels typically means no length restriction will be applied to the mask value.

        Returns:
        The storage type of value being masked
        Since:
        1.8.0

      • getMaxLength

        long getMaxLength()
        Get the maximum size of the value being masked. The max length will be set if known for all storage types. For string types, this be either the number of characters, or the number of byte of storage available, depending on whether isStringMaxLengthEncoded() returns true.
        Returns:
        The maximum length of the masked value
        Since:
        1.8.0

      • getDateTimeFormatter

        java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter getDateTimeFormatter()
        Get a formatter appropriate for converting String values to and from LocalDateTime objects.
        Returns:
        The formatter.

      • getStringMaxLength

        int getStringMaxLength()
        Get the maximum length of String that will fit in the field. This method is now an alias for getMaxLength, with the exception that values greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE are reported as Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Returns:
        The maximum length of the masked String.

      • isStringMaxLengthEncoded

        boolean isStringMaxLengthEncoded()
        Get a boolean value indicating whether the value returned by getStringMaxLength() method represents the maximum Java String length in characters (false), or a byte length limit that should be applied to the encoded String (true).
        Returns:
        whether the value of getStringMaxLength represents a byte limit on the encoded value

      • getStringCharsetName

        java.lang.String getStringCharsetName()
        Get the name of the Charset used to encode string values in the underlying data format.
        Returns:
        The name of the Charset.

      • getNumericPrecision

        int getNumericPrecision()

        Get the numeric precision, in digits, of the field. This is the maximum number of base 10 digits that can be store in the field without rounding. This value is approximate when storageType is LONG or DOUBLE, and indicates the number of full decimal digits the field can carry. For example, a 16-bit integer will show value of 4, since the values from 32,768 - 99,999 cannot be represented.

        This value is undefined for storage types other than BIG_DECIMAL, LONG and DOUBLE.

        A value of 0 will be returned if the numeric precision is known

        Returns:
        The base numeric precision of the field
        Since:
        1.8.0

      • getMaskingType

        MaskingAlgorithm.MaskingType getMaskingType()
        Get the MaskingAlgorithm.MaskingType type of the values being masked. This information is provided to allow ADVANCED_OBJECT type algorithms to determine the underlying object type for values being masked.
        Returns:
        The type of value being masked
        Since:
        1.5.0
